casebody.data:
No. 286,

Misc.

Mathis v. United States. Nicholas J. Capuano for petitioner. Solicitor General Marshall, Assistant Attorney General Rogovin, Joseph M. Howard and John M. Brant for the United States.

C. A. 5th Cir. Motion for leave to proceed in forma pau-peris and petition for writ of certiorari granted. Case transferred to appellate docket.

Mr. Justice Marshall took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition and motion.
